headline: Goldman Sachs Profits Double
body: Goldman Sachs reported quarterly earnings that beat analyst expectations, driven by strong performance in investment banking.

headline: Bitcoin ETF Decision Delayed
body: The SEC announced a delay in the approval process for ARK's proposed Bitcoin ETF.

headline: EUR/USD Falls After ECB Announcement
body: The euro dropped sharply against the U.S. dollar following a policy statement from the European Central Bank.
